title: The Car Ride Episode: Stories for Children
itunes:author: Rhea Pechter
itunes:summary:
LSFTP Update! My LITTLE HEDGEHOG PICTURE BOOK is AVAILABLE NOW! Find it by searching for "Little Hedgehog Goes to School" on Amazon or by visiting [THIS LINK](https://amzn.to/3RRovO5). I hope you LOVE IT!
Do your kids love hearing LSFTP in the car, but do you hate having to keep hitting play between stories? The Car Ride Episode offers several stories your kids know and love, conveniently strung together for an uninterrupted 43 minutes. You'll hear Mouse Bakes a Cake, Ruby Takes Her Time, Little Rabbit Can't Eat Clover, Grumbly Bear & Strumbly Bear, and Over the Swing. Enjoy!
Stay tuned for new stories beginning February 27, 2016! And take a moment to share the podcast with a friend. Thanks for listening!
www.littlestoriestinypeople.com
